name: Holiday Inn Paris-St. Germain Des Pres

reviews.text: We chose this hotel based on the reviews here and we were not disappointed. The checkin was prompt and efficient. Even checking in early in the morning after the trans Atlantic flight, our room was ready. We had reserved a deluxe room. It was large for European hotel rooms. The furnishings were just fine, nothing fancy, but nothing bad either; really typical of Holiday Inn. The bathroom was large and nice. The high speed internet worked just great. The location is great, subway stop 1/2 block away and train station only about a 10 min walk. Several good restaurants within easy walking distance. Our room rate included breakfast in the hotel and it was great. The staff were friendly, spoke good English and were very helpful. We would definitely recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.text: We booked a room through Hotwire for $99US/night, taxes inc., for 4 nights (7-12 April/06). The standard room available through Hotwire is very small by North American standards. We found the pluses of this hotel to include:
reviews.title: Great for the price!

reviews.text: - great location, a 2 min. walk from two different Metro lines: #4 (Saint-Michel, Notre-Dame Cathedral, Les Halles) & #12 (Musee d'Orsay, Concorde, Montmartre). Close to the Luxembourg Gardens, la Tour Montparnasse and very EASY walking distance to Boulevard Saint-Germain. Direct bus #82 to Les Invalides and the Tour Eiffel. Close to two OpenTour lines, stops within 10 & 15 min. walks.
reviews.title: What a dump

reviews.text: I stopped in this hotel with another friend and on first impression it seemed quite pleasent. Staff were friendly with good English. The hotel was well located, with metro station nearby.
reviews.title: Wouldn't stop again....

reviews.text: The room was quite small even for a European City hotel, and decor needed updating a little. Our first morning we were awoke at 7am by banging from the room above. It turned out they were being refurbished. After asking if we could move room due to the noise we were told this was not possible. After another two morning of being awoke at similar times, and constantly complaining and asking for the manager (who obviously didn't exist!) we still had no luck.
reviews.title: fine for the Price

likes.liked: — location, accessibility to central Paris on foot, and PRICE (on) LINE price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When checking out, the receptionist was quite rude, when we asked if there was anyway of being compensated. There is definately no way I would recommend this hotel if you are looking for a relaxing few days in Paris.
reviews.title: Okay hotel - good location

reviews.text: Fine hotel, particularly when paying a bargain price through an on-line bidding service. Excellent location for shopping, less than a minute walk to the metro, five-ten minutes on foot from the historical center of Paris & St. Germain Des Pres. Five minutes walk to a Starbucks on Bd. Montparnasse to avoid steep hotel breakfast prices. On-site parking at €14/day: rare and reasonable for central Paris. Rooms clean. Staff friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Saint Placide Metro, 20 steps away!

likes.liked: — The location with the Metro next door
likes.disliked: — The placement of the soap dispenser and the towel bar

reviews.text: Having utilised this hotel several times previously, my wife and I stayed for 4 days just prior to Christmas.
reviews.title: Great hotel in the Luxembourg Quarter!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would recommend this hotel especially for its location. The Reception staff were very helpful and the room was nice and clean. The room rate obtained from the Holiday Inn website was good.
reviews.title: Good Value Hotel
Loved the Holiday Inn St. Germain
reviews.text: Two Metro stations are very close to the hotel (St Placide & Rennes) and very quickly we were able to get from the hotel to the famous tourist attractions via the Metro (found that purchasing 10 Metro each when first arriving was very convenient & reasonable).

reviews.title: Really nice breakfast
reviews.text: I had an enjoyable stay at the Holiday Inn-St. Germain, near the St. Placide metro station. This was my first time in Paris and really liked the location of the hotel. The bathroom could have been nicer, but I am American and accustomed to toiletries in the bathroom, which this hotel did not have much off. Soap was not available so bring your own soap from home. I found the location convenient and liked the shops around St. Germain and is walking distance (5 blocks) from Jardin Luxembourg.

My wife and I stayed at Holiday Inn Saint Germain for five nights at the beginning of this month. The location is great, near two metro stations and rue de Rennes, wich is a nice place to shop and walk around. It's also near Boulevard Saint Germain. In the other hand, the Eiffel Tower is not far (we walked there in our first day and it was very pleasant). The reception was helpful and spoke fluent english (much more fluent than mine). The room was a bit small, but not for an european hotel. The breakfast was a good surprise: the croissant was magnificent and there were many options of fruits and various kinds of cheese. My wife loved their scrambled eggs. I will sure would stay there again.
reviews.title: fair for room, overall OK
Good
reviews.text: Staff was very courteous and obliging. It took three room assignments on check-in to get us a room with a queen-sized bed. Room was one of the smallest European hotel rooms we have stayed in; bathroom was adequate. Very few amenities were offered; a coffee maker in the room would have been a plus.

aka: Holiday Inn Paris-St. Germain Des Pres Hotel Paris
description: The Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pres Hotel is ideally situated in the prime location in the heart of Paris at Latin Quarter area, and Montparnasse area neighbourhood. We are the perfect three stars hotel for business and leisure. Great hospitality and adventures in Paris are waiting for you The hotel is easy to get to : 25 minutes from Orly, 40 minutes from Charles de Gaulle airport, at walking distance from the Montparnasse train station and bordering the Saint Placide metro station, line 4. The hotel provides a private parking.The hotel is located close to the main monument Notre de Dame, Musee du Louvre, Tour Eiffel, Cabaret and Theater. At walking distance to Seine River and Luxembourg Garden. With a total of 134 rooms including 22 superior rooms and 8 family rooms, the Holiday Inn Paris Saint Germain des Pres Hotel will welcome you in a cosy and modern environment. Our family room provides all the facilities of 2 separate rooms. The hotel offers a restaurant, room service and a friendly bar. Our three meeting rooms can cater to all your business needs and have a capacity of maximum 70 people.
